business.headline: OpenAI's Sam Altman meets with IT minister to discuss India's AI roadmapIn a post on X, Ashwini Vaishnaw said he had a "super cool discussion" with Altman on India's "strategy of creating the entire AI stack - GPUs, model, and apps" and that OpenAI was willing to collaborate on all three.

Will Rs 12 lakh income qualify for zero tax even with capital gains?The biggest announcement was that individuals earning up to Rs 12 lakh would not have to pay any tax. But does this still apply if you have additional income from capital gains? Here is all you need to know.

Zepto delivering cars now? Skoda's new teaser sparks buzzQuick commerce platforms like Blinkit, BigBasket and Zepto started delivering iPhone 16 in a few minutes, challenging traditional e-commerce giants Amazon and Flipkart, last year in September.

Arbitrator may decide who controls Ratan Tata's fortune: ReportRatan Tata had set up two entities in 2022 to manage his personal wealth for charitable purposes—the RTEF under Section 8 of the Companies Act 2013 and the Ratan Tata Endowment Trust.

Services sector growth slows to more than 2-year low in JanuaryDemand for services rose at the slowest pace in 14 months but remained sturdy. It was supported by international demand that was the strongest in five months.

Explained: Is China playing it safe in latest trade war with US? US-China trade war: China's countermeasures appear more restrained compared to its approach during the previous trade war. This has raised a key question: Is China playing it safe in the latest trade standoff with the US?

ITC Hotels to be dropped from Sensex, BSE indices today. Here's why ITC Hotels shares opened at Rs 188 per share on the BSE and Rs 180 per share on the NSE at a discount of over 30% compared to the discovered price of Rs 260 on the NSE and Rs 270 on the BSE.

Sensex, Nifty open flat as RBI policy meet kicks off; FMCG stocks fallShare Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 14.87 points to 78,568.94, while the NSE Nifty50 added 30.40 points to 23,769.65 as of 9:28 AM.

RBI MPC meeting starts today: Will new Governor Sanjay Malhotra cut rates?RBI MPC Meeting 2025: The repo rate has been unchanged at 6.5% since February 2023, and the last rate cut was announced during the Covid-19 pandemic in May 2020.

Bull run on Dalal Street: Will the stock market rally last? Share market today: The stock market saw a bull run in the last session with the benchmark indices, Sensex and Nifty, both closing over 1.5% higher, driven by gains in banking and financial stocks.

Ratan Tata's millennial friend Shantanu Naidu gets top role at Tata MotorsIn 2018, Shantanu Naidu began working as Ratan Tata's assistant, a role that brought him public attention, especially after a viral video of his birthday surprise for the industrialist.

P Chidambaram on Budget 2025: 'GST cut would have benefited everybody'Former Finance Minister P Chidambaram analysed Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget 2025, criticising its focus on tax cuts for a small segment of the population.

GST Council to decide on fewer, lower tax rates soon: Nirmala SitharamanFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman stated on Tuesday that the GST Council is close to finalising a decision on tax rate rationalisation, with the review process nearly complete. At present, the Goods and Services Tax (GST) is structured into four slabs: 5 per cent, 12 per cent, 18 per cent, and 28 per cent.
How to get a student credit card? Check eligibility and documents requiredWhile the credit card can be a valuable financial tool, students must be aware of its potential misuse and pitfalls.

I will think about India: Nirmala Sitharaman as Trump 2.0 goes big on cryptoFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said that the government during its G20 presidency pushed for a global understanding of crypto regulations and how to tackle trading in cryptocurrencies.

Market rally: Sensex jumps 1,397 points, Nifty nears 23,750 as bulls take chargeStock Market: The S&P BSE Sensex surged by 1397.07 points to close at 78,583.81, while the NSE Nifty50 added 378.20 points to end at 23,739.25.

Exclusive: Nirmala Sitharaman on Budget 2025 tax relief for citizensFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman stated that the tax relief introduced in Budget 2025 reflects Prime Minister Narendra Modi's commitment to honouring taxpayers for their contribution to nation-building.

Why did Hindenburg go after Adani Group? Nathan Anderson breaks silenceHindenburg Research founder Nathan Anderson maintained that all the firm's reports, including the one on Adani Group, were accurate.

Nirmala Sitharaman dismisses tax relief link with Delhi electionFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman dismissed speculation that the government increased the tax relief to Rs 12 lakh due to the upcoming Delhi elections.
No plans to shut it down: Nirmala Sitharaman on old tax regimeFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman table the Union Budget 2025 on February 1, 2025.

entertainment.headline: Ed Sheeran meets AR Rahman, sparks collaboration rumoursEd Sheeran and AR Rahman shared a picture together, sparking collaboration rumours. Fans are excited about the possibility of a joint musical project.

Blackpink's Lisa shares release date of White Lotus Season 3. WatchThe release date of the highly-anticipated White Lotus Season 3 is here. The HBO show will begin streaming from this month.

Mufasa: The Lion King to stream on OTT from February, but here's the catchMufasa: The Lion King is set to stream on Disney+ Hotstar from February 18. The musical film will be available to stream on Video-on-demand.

Vincenzo actor Ok Taec-yeon's agency responds to rumoured proposal picturesImages of Ok Taec-yeon proposing to his girlfriend sparked rumours online. His agency clarified these images are not proposal pictures and urged fans to rely on official news.

Bianca's sheer dress, almost giving the illusion of nudity on the red carpet, drew criticism from all across.

IVE Empathy review: A sonic and musical evolution of the K-pop groupIVE embarks on a new journey with their 3rd EP 'IVE EMPATHY', expanding their musical themes to embrace empathy. The album highlights the group's evolving artistry and global appeal, marking another milestone in their impressive career.

Netflix removes Karla Sofia Gascon from Oscar campaign after controversial postsEmilia Perez actor Karla Sofia Gascon has been removed from Netflix's Oscar campaign for the film. This comes following backlash over her controversial posts in the past.

Ed Sheeran gets a head massage in Chennai, jokes 'it's abuse'. WatchSinger Ed Sheeran is currently in India. On Tuesday, the British singing sensation shared a fun video of himself getting a head massage in Chennai.

Squid Game 3, Mantis to Genie Make a Wish: Netflix unveils 2025 K-drama slateNetflix unveiled the 2025 slate of its upcoming K-dramas and films. From Squid Game 3, Mantis to Genie Make a Wish, here's what all you can watch on the OTT site.

Vivekanandan Viralanu: Here's where you can watch the Tom Chacko releaseMalayalam actors Shine Tom Chacko and Swasika's Vivekanandan Viralanu will soon be available to stream on an OTT platform. The announcement was shared by makers on social media recently.

Avinash Tiwary jokes that theirs offers the real family drama.

Sarah Michelle Gellar to star in Buffy the Vampire Slayer sequel: ReportActor Sarah Michelle Gellar will reportedly be reprising her role as Buffy Summers for Buffy the Vampire Slayer's sequel on Hulu. Chloe Zhao is in talks to direct the show.

Game Changer OTT release: When and where to watch Ram Charan-Kiara Advani filmRam Charan's Game Changer OTT release date: Shankar's telugu directorial, Game Changer, is all set to stream on OTT soon. Read details about when and where you can watch the Ram Charan and Kiara Advani-starrer on OTT.

During their appearance, Karisma recreated one of her iconic scenes from Hum Saath Saath Hain with Badshah.

Dining With The Kapoors: Kareena, Ranbir, and family bond over food and filmsThe entire Kapoor Khandaan including Kareena Kapoor, Ranbir Kapoor, Karisma Kapoor, and others have united for a Netflix special film, Dining With the Kapoors. The project was announced as a part of the Netflix 2025 slate.

general news.headline: US military plane carrying 104 illegal Indian immigrants lands in AmritsarPolice and civil administration officials were at the airport to receive the 104 illegal immigrants comprising 79 men and 25 women.  An official from the US Embassy was also present.

As Delhi votes, AAP alleges cash distribution, BJP claims fraud voting  Live UpdatesWill AAP hold its stronghold, the BJP end its losing streak, or the Congress stage a surprise comeback? Delhi decides today as 1.56 crore voters cast their ballots across all 70 constituencies.
PM Modi takes holy dip in Sangam at Maha Kumbh, performs aartiMaha Kumbh 2025: PM Modi performed the ritual bath, offered prayers and is likely to address a gathering and talk about nation-building.

Pak terror group kept bleeding India, USAID kept funding itOver half of American international funding is channelled through USAID, which is in US President Donald Trump's crosshairs. Despite red flags, USAID ended up funding the Pakistan-based Falah-e-Insaniat Foundation (FIF), a front for Hafiz Saeed-led Lashkar e-Taiba (LeT). USAID funded the FIF and LeT, which led multiple terror attacks in India, despite it being banned by the US government.

Why Visa Hanuman is so sought after these days Across India, "visa temples" attract people aspiring to work and live abroad. From Gujarat's Visa Hanuman to Punjab's Hawaijahaj (Aeroplane) Gurdwara, places of worship are seeing a rush of devotees amid the uncertainty over the H-1B visa programme and hiring uncertainties in the US.
Mallikarjun Kharge loses cool at BJP MP in Rajya Sabha: 'Your father was with me'Mallikarjun Kharge lost his cool when BJP MP Neeraj Shekhar interrupted him during his speech in Rajya Sabha.

Stampede scare during 2nd ODI ticket sale in Cuttack, few fans fall unconsciousA stampede-like situation erupted during the ticket sale for the 2nd ODI in Cuttack, as massive crowds gathered in anticipation of the India vs England match. The overwhelming rush led to chaotic scenes, with several fans struggling to maintain their footing at the overcrowded ticket counters.

Asteroid blast carved two grand canyons on Moon in just 10 minutesThe energy to produce the grand canyons on the Moon is about 130 times larger than the energy in the global inventory of nuclear weapons.

Delhi voting in 300+ AQI. Will it be gasp, vote, gasp, again?Delhi Election 2025: As Delhi votes amid a 300+ AQI, manifestos of the BJP, the AAP and the Congress reveal how tackling air pollution in the national capital remains just an afterthought. While AAP and Congress barely speak about it, the BJP at least mentions smog in its manifesto. With no real urgency from leaders or voters, Delhi's toxic air remains just another seasonal grievance.

US will take over Gaza: Trump's shock announcement with Netanyahu by his sideUS President Donald Trump said that the US will take over and develop Gaza, asserting long-term ownership, while Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called it a historic idea that could reshape Gaza's future.

PM Modi in athleisure for holy dip at Kumbh, puffer jacket-pahari topi for aartiPM Modi grabbed attention for his sartorial choices at Maha Kumbh Mela. Trump might revoke extension of H-1B, L-1 visa auto-renewalThe extension period of work visas increased by the Biden government might soon come to an end with Donald Trump back in the White House. Pics: Arvind Kejriwal with family, S Jaishankar, Rahul Gandhi vote in DelhiDelhi election 2025 Voting: Polling for all the 70 seats began at 7 am and will end at 6pm, followed by the release of exit poll results. The election is a fierce contest between the ruling Aam Aadmi Party (AAP), which is seeking a third consecutive term, the BJP, aiming to unseat the incumbent government, and the Congress, hoping for a political resurgence in the national capital. A total of 699 candidates are contesting for 70 constituencies. The election results will be announced on February 8.

Trump says Iran will be obliterated if they assassinate him: I left instructionsIf Donald Trump were assassinated, Vice President JD Vance would become president and would not necessarily be bound by any instructions left by his predecessor. Parunika absorbs Laxman pep-talk, Mithali Raj advice to live World Cup dreamIn an exclusive interview with India Today Digital, left-arm spinner Parunika Sisodia opened up on India's campaign in the U19 Women's T20 World Cup. Parunika was India's most economical bowler, having taken 10 wickets. The 19-year-old also won the Player of the Match award in the semi-final against England.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".
